Player History
Drafted in 33rd round, 521st overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Injured on 4/30/2015 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 7/15/2016 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 6/13/2017 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Philadelphia to Houston on 3/2/2020 (Going to HOU: CF Hugh Lalonde, C James Howell, C Juan Forest. Going to PHI: 3B Tyler Gauna)...
Traded from Houston to Kansas City on 6/5/2020 (Going to KC: RF Hugh Lalonde, P Jason Delvalle. Going to HOU: C Hayden Bongiorno, 1B Bill West)...
Had first career hit on 8/20/2020, off Bill Birdwell (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/18/2020, off James Lashley (HOU)...
Injured on 9/6/2022 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
